title: New Trek E-Caliber e-MTB is under 35lbs, can drop the motor to get even lighter
content:
The all-new Trek e-Caliber comes in as light as ~34lb in top trim, giving them a very lightweight full suspension e-mountain bike with a twist. Built around the Fazua motor-and-battery combo, you can quickly remove the powered drive system and have an “analog” mountain bike for any trail. Based on their Supercaliber XC race bike, […]

The post New Trek E-Caliber e-MTB is under 35lbs, can drop the motor to get even lighter appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
